Description: Sketch for `Flight into Egypt' ? ; a man leading a horse on which are his wife and child, with a small sketch of the same subject Pen and brown and black ink
Bibliographic references: Binyon 1898-1907 / Catalogue of drawings by British artists, and artists of foreign origin working in Great Britain (15(a))
Sunderland / John Hamilton Mortimer: his life and works (194)
